member.name: IMFCaptureEngineClassFactory.CreateInstance
member.summary: Creates an instance of the capture engine.

param.name: clsid
param.para: The CLSID of the object to create.
Currently, this parameter must equal CLSID_MFCaptureEngine.

member.param: The IID of the requested interface. The capture engine supports the interface.
Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureEngineClassFactory
member.summary: Creates an instance of the capture engine.
